question: Which country houses "Malolotja National Park"?
explanation: Malolotja National Park is located in Eswatini which shares its border with South Africa. This park houses the second-highest mountain of Eswatini "Ngwenya Mountain" and "Malolotja Falls", the highest waterfall of Eswatini. This park forms part of the Lubombo Transfrontier Conservation Area.
